issue.title: [C++] [Python] MakeDense and MakeSparse in UnionArray should accept a vector of Field
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4622](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4622). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently MakeDense and MakeUnion of UnionArray couldn't create a UnionArray with user-specified field names.  This is bugs of these functions.

To fix them, optional arguments of std::vector<Field> should be added.

GLib and Python bindings should be fixed, together.
